Bash(git -C /Users/shanks/work/Health commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve 6-perspective review findings \(P1-4, P2-8, P3\)

- P1: div/0 in trend calc, O\(n²\)→O\(n+m\) daily score, extract
  HighlightBuilder shared util, consolidate isDistanceBased to
  WorkoutSummary domain model
- P2: didSet cache invalidation for scroll-reactive props, move
  TimePeriod formatting to Presentation extension, cancel-before-spawn
  Task pattern, Task.isCancelled guard on isLoading reset, pagination
  race fix, chart accessibility div/0, linear regression NaN validation,
  aggregator empty-group guard
- P3: replace 12 force-unwraps with nil-coalescing in TimePeriod
- Fix deprecated HKWorkout.totalEnergyBurned → statistics\(for:\) API

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
